title: Liam Hemsworth is 'taking it slow' with new girlfriend Maddison Brown
text:

Hunger Games star Liam Hemsworth is reportedly taking his budding romance at a chilled pace.

The hunky star, 29, recently split from wife Miley Cyrus , and has moved on with 22 year-old fellow Aussie Maddison Brown.

The two were snapped in New York together, and fans are going wild speculating about the blossoming relationship.

Now, a source has told WHO magazine that Liam is taking everything steady.

The source said: "[The relationship is] very new. Liam is taking it slow but he's definitely interested in her."

Liam's fans were relieved to see him moving on from Miley, after he retired to his brother Chris' house in Byron Bay, Australia following their split.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: maddisonbrown/Instagram)

Miley herself quickly moved on with Brody Jenner's ex Kaitlynn Carter, but is now with musician Cody Simpson.

They seem to be going strong, especially after Miley's manager said that they've both moved on from their hard-partying days.

Matt Zeidman said: "It is early, but their friendship is longstanding and deeper than people realise.

(Image: Instagram)

"Though they originally met during their own wilder phases, they're both sober now and are focused on health, work and spending time together. Seems pretty ideal to me."

Miley and Liam were married for less than a year, and after years of on-off dating.

The pop sensation hit back at claims that they'd called it quits on their marriage because of infidelity on her part.

Miley denied cheating on Liam, and says that while she has regrets about her past, she won't back down when faced with untrue allegations.

The Wrecking Ball singer wrote: "What I cannot accept is being told I'm lying to cover up a crime I haven't committed.

"I have nothing to hide."
description: Liam and new flame Maddison were recently snapped looking loved up on a date together in New York City
